description: Schemas in #/definitions detect or validate keys/objects (direct children) uniquely used to describe Annotation Collections (Section 5.1 and 5.2).
title: Definitions: Annotation Collections.

$eref.description: True when the object has no label or has one or more label values of type string (Section 5.1)
$eref.title: Definition: label (Annotation Collections)

_88labelFound.description: True when the object has one or more label value(s) (Section 5.1)
_88labelFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Collection label

_88annotationPageTypeValueFound.description: True when the Annotation Page has type key and 'AnnotationPage' is a value of type (Section 5.2)
_88annotationPageTypeValueFound.title: Implementation: AnnotationPage type

$eref.description: True when the string has value 'AnnotationPage' (Section 5.2)
$eref.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationPage type value string included in Page description

$eref.description: True when the array contains a string item having value 'AnnotationPage' (Section 5.2)
$eref.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationPage type in array included in Page description

_88partOfValidIfPresent.description: True when the Annotation Page has no partOf key or has 1 partOf key value that is string of format uri (Section 5.2)
_88partOfValidIfPresent.title: Validation: partOf value (Annotation Page)

$eref.description: True when the object has exactly one total value of type integer and greater than zero (Section 5.1)
$eref.title: Definition: total more than zero (Annotation Collections)

$eref.description: True when the object has exactly one first value (Section 5.1)
$eref.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Collection first key

$eref.description: True when the object has exactly one total value of type integer and greater than zero (Section 5.1)
$eref.title: Definition: total more than zero (Annotation Collections)

_88firstRequiredIfTotalMoreThanZero.description: True when the object has no total or has total = zero or has exactly one first value (Section 5.1)
_88firstRequiredIfTotalMoreThanZero.title: If total greater than zero, check for implementation of Annotation Collection first key

_88labelDefinition.description: True when the object has no label or has one or more label values of type string (Section 5.1)
_88labelDefinition.title: Definition: label (Annotation Collections)

_88lastValidIfPresent.description: True when the Annotation Collection has no last key or has 1 last key value that is string of format uri (Section 5.1)
_88lastValidIfPresent.title: Validation: last value (Annotation Collection)

_88firstValidIfPresent.description: True when the Annotation Collection has no first key or has 1 first key value that is string of format uri or has first key value that is an object of type AnnotationPage (Section 5.1)
_88firstValidIfPresent.title: Validation: first value (Annotation Collection)

$eref.description: True when the Annotation Page has type key and 'AnnotationPage' is a value of type (Section 5.2)
$eref.title: Implementation: AnnotationPage type

$eref.description: True when the Annotation Page has type key and 'AnnotationPage' is a value of type (Section 5.2)
$eref.title: Implementation: AnnotationPage type

$eref.description: True when the object has no startIndex key or has exactly one startIndex value of type integer greater or equal to zero (Section 5.2)
$eref.title: Definition: startIndex (Annotation Pages)

_88startIndexFound.description: True when the object has exactly one startIndex value (Section 5.2)
_88startIndexFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Page startIndex key

_88itemsFound.description: True when the object has items key with value that is an array of strings of format uri and/or objects of type Annotation (Section 5.2)
_88itemsFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Page items key

$eref.description: True when the Annotation has type key and 'Annotation' is a value of type (Section 3.1)
$eref.title: Implementation: Annotation type

$eref.description: True when the string has value 'AnnotationPage' (Section 5.2)
$eref.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationPage type value string included in Page description

_88annotationPageTypeValueInArrayRecogni.description: True when the array contains a string item having value 'AnnotationPage' (Section 5.2)
_88annotationPageTypeValueInArrayRecogni.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationPage type in array included in Page description

_88startIndexDefinition.description: True when the object has no startIndex key or has exactly one startIndex value of type integer greater or equal to zero (Section 5.2)
_88startIndexDefinition.title: Definition: startIndex (Annotation Pages)

$eref.description: True when the Annotation Page has no partOf key or has 1 partOf key value that is string of format uri (Section 5.2)
$eref.title: Validation: partOf value (Annotation Page)

_88partOfFound.description: True when the object has exactly one partOf value that is string of format uri (Section 5.2)
_88partOfFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Page partOf key

$eref.description: True when the Annotation Collection has no first key or has 1 first key value that is string of format uri or has first key value that is an object of type AnnotationPage (Section 5.1)
$eref.title: Validation: first value (Annotation Collection)

_88firstFound.description: True when the object has exactly one first value (Section 5.1)
_88firstFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Collection first key

_88prevValidIfPresent.description: True when the Annotation Page has no prev key or has 1 prev key value that is string of format uri (Section 5.2)
_88prevValidIfPresent.title: Validation: prev value (Annotation Page)

$eref.description: True when the string has value http://www.w3.org/ns/anno.jsonld (Section 5)
$eref.title: Definition: Valid @context string included in Collection / Page description

_88contextValueInArrayFound.description: True when the array contains a string item having value http://www.w3.org/ns/anno.jsonld (Section 5)
_88contextValueInArrayFound.title: Definition: Valid @context string found in array included in Collection / Page description

$eref.description: True when the string has value 'AnnotationCollection' (Section 5.1)
$eref.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationCollection type value string included in Collection description

_88annotationCollectionTypeValueInArrayR.description: True when the array contains a string item having value 'AnnotationCollection' (Section 5.1)
_88annotationCollectionTypeValueInArrayR.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationCollection type in array included in Collection description

_88totalMoreThanZero.description: True when the object has exactly one total value of type integer and greater than zero (Section 5.1)
_88totalMoreThanZero.title: Definition: total more than zero (Annotation Collections)

_88contextValueFound.description: True when the string has value http://www.w3.org/ns/anno.jsonld (Section 5)
_88contextValueFound.title: Definition: Valid @context string included in Collection / Page description

$eref.description: True when the object has no total key or has exactly one total value of type integer greater or equal to zero (Section 5.1)
$eref.title: Definition: total (Annotation Collections)

_88totalFound.description: True when the object has exactly one total value (Section 5.1)
_88totalFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Collection total key

$eref.description: True when the Annotation Page has no prev key or has 1 prev key value that is string of format uri (Section 5.2)
$eref.title: Validation: prev value (Annotation Page)

_88prevFound.description: True when the object has exactly one prev value that is string of format uri (Section 5.2)
_88prevFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Page prev key

_88annotationPageTypeValueRecognized.description: True when the string has value 'AnnotationPage' (Section 5.2)
_88annotationPageTypeValueRecognized.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationPage type value string included in Page description

$eref.description: True when the Annotation Collection has no last key or has 1 last key value that is string of format uri (Section 5.1)
$eref.title: Validation: last value (Annotation Collection)

_88lastFound.description: True when the object has exactly one last value that is string of format uri (Section 5.1)
_88lastFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Collection last key

_88annotationCollectionTypeValueRecogniz.description: True when the string has value 'AnnotationCollection' (Section 5.1)
_88annotationCollectionTypeValueRecogniz.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationCollection type value string included in Collection description

_88nextValidIfPresent.description: True when the Annotation Page has no next key or has 1 next key value that is string of format uri (Section 5.2)
_88nextValidIfPresent.title: Validation: next value (Annotation Page)

_88totalDefinition.description: True when the object has no total key or has exactly one total value of type integer greater or equal to zero (Section 5.1)
_88totalDefinition.title: Definition: total (Annotation Collections)

_88annotationCollectionTypeValueFound.description: True when the Annotation Collection has type key and 'AnnotationCollection' is a value of type (Section 5.1)
_88annotationCollectionTypeValueFound.title: Implementation: AnnotationCollection type

$eref.description: True when the string has value 'AnnotationCollection' (Section 5.1)
$eref.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationCollection type value string included in Collection description

$eref.description: True when the array contains a string item having value 'AnnotationCollection' (Section 5.1)
$eref.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationCollection type in array included in Collection description

$eref.description: True when the Annotation Page has no next key or has 1 next key value that is string of format uri (Section 5.2)
$eref.title: Validation: next value (Annotation Page)

_88nextFound.description: True when the object has exactly one next value that is string of format uri (Section 5.2)
_88nextFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Page next key
